name: Ferienwohnung Steger
description:
Welcome to! 

You are looking for peace and relaxation in the Zillertal mountains, want to be active and make the experience of nature in the center. We offer an affordable alternative to hotels and guest houses. 

Our house is in a quiet yet central location at the outskirts of Mayrhofen on the bank of the Ziller. In just a few minutes walk from the town center with shops, restaurants and the valley station of the cable-cars. Whether hiking or biking tour - start right outside the front door of our magnificent natural setting. Detailed information about the apartment you will find on the following pages. 

We look forward to your visit! 
Steger Family
Welcome to! 

You are looking for peace and relaxation in the Zillertal mountains, want to be active and make the experience of nature in the center. We offer an affordable alternative to hotels and guest houses. 

Our house is situated in a quiet location on the outskirts of Mayrhofen, next to the slope of the Ahorn cable car. In a few minutes walk from the center of Mayrhofen, the cable-cars and the ice rink. The ski bus stop can be found in close proximity to easily reach the surrounding ski areas of the Zillertal. 

We look forward to your visit! 
Steger Family
Check in: 14.00 
Check out: 10.00 
If you come here with car:
"Inntalautobahn A12" - exit Zillervalley - road 169 

or

Munich - "Bad Tölz" - "Achenseepass" - Zillervalley

train: trainstation Jenbach/Tyrol - "Zillertalbahn" ( train or bus )

airport: Innsbruck 65 km / Munich 190 km

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
description:
Facilities: 
The apartment for 2-3 persons is comfortably furnished and approximately 50 m² in size. At the entrance you will find a spacious wardrobe. The kitchenette with dining area is fully equipped with ceramic hob, oven, kettle, coffee maker, etc. The living room has TV, stereo, and a wood-burning fireplace. In the basement there is a large double room which stays pleasantly cool even on very hot summer days and a bathroom with shower, wash basin and heated towel rail. The toilet is separate. Bed linen, towels and tea towels are at your disposal. For your mobile devices you use our free Wi-Fi. 
In our large garden are sun loungers and a seating area. After a hike of the day can end comfortably during grilling. 
The car park is located directly in front of the house. For setting your bikes you like to use our garage. 

Bakery service: 
Your selected on the previous day bread we bring you the morning to your apartment door.
The apartment for 2-3 persons is comfortably furnished and approximately 50 m² in size. At the entrance you will find a spacious wardrobe. The kitchenette with dining area is fully equipped with hob, oven, fridge, kettle, coffee maker, etc. In the living-room sofa you can end your ski day at the cozy fireplace. In the basement is a spacious double bedroom and a bathroom with shower and heated towel rail and a separate WC. Bed linen, towels and tea towels are at your disposal. To use your mobile devices while on holiday cost, we provide you willing also to the Internet. 

For your winter gear, our ski deposit with boots warmer and slide and skid plates we can lend you if necessary. The hotel's own parking lot is of course free. 

Bakery service: 

Your selected on the previous day bread we bring you the morning to your apartment door.
